task.en: Help me modify settings to use scale effect when minimizing windows.
task.zh: 帮我把最小化窗口时的动态效果改成缩放效果。
task.ar: ساعدني في تعديل الإعدادات لاستخدام تأثير التدرج عند تصغير النوافذ.
task.ja: ウィンドウを最小化する際にスケールエフェクトを使用するように設定を変更してください。
task.ru: Измените настройки, чтобы использовать эффект масштабирования при сворачивании окон.

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults delete com.apple.dock mineffect; killall Dock
grading_command: defaults read com.apple.dock mineffect 2>/dev/null | grep -q "scale" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Desktop & Dock" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "桌面与程序坞" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "سطح المكتب وشريط الأيقونات" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "デスクトップとDock" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Рабочий стол и Dock" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
